method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used in the authentication process. The ticket obtained from this method is used to generate an authentication page for the user to login.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used in the authorization process. You should call this method after the user has authorized oneself on the Box.net partner authentication page. Pass the ticket that you get when calling the get_ticket method.

param.name: ticket
param.doc: The ticket obtained from the get_ticket API method (part of the initial steps in the authentication process).

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to logout a user.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to register a new user.

param.name: login
param.doc: The login username for the user you intend to create.

param.name: password
param.doc: The login password for the user you intend to create.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to verify whether a user email is available, or already in use.

param.name: login
param.doc: The login username of the user for which you would like to verify registration.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to get the user's account information. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to get a tree representing all of the user's files and folders. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: folder_id
param.doc: The ID of the root folder from which the tree begins. If this value is "0", the user's full account tree is returned.

param.name: params
param.doc: Additional, optional parameters.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method creates a new folder in a user's account. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: parent_id
param.doc: The folder_id in which the new folder will be created.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the folder when it will be created.

param.name: share
param.doc: A binary parameter which can be set to 1 in order to allow the folder to be shared.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method moves a file or folder into another folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be moved. Can be 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to move. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

param.name: destination_id
param.doc: The folder_id of the folder to which you will move the item.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method copies a file into another folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be copied. Currently this can only be set to 'file'

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the file you wish to copy.

param.name: destination_id
param.doc: The folder_id of the folder to which you will copy the item.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method renames a file or folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be renamed. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to rename. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

param.name: new_name
param.doc: The new name to be applied to the item.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method deletes a file or folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be deleted. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to delete. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method retrieves the details for a specified file. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: file_id
param.doc: The id of the file for with you want to obtain more information.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method sets the description for a file or folder.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item being targeted. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to set a description for. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

param.name: description
param.doc: The description to be applied to the item.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method makes a file or folder shareable, and may initiate sharing through Box.net email notifications. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be shared. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to share. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

param.name: password
param.doc: The password to protect the folder or file.

param.name: message
param.doc: An message to be included in a notification email.

param.name: emails
param.doc: An array of emails for which to notify users about the newly shared file or folder.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method unshares a file or folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be unshared. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to unshare. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method privately shares a file or folder with another user(s). Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be shared. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to share. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

param.name: message
param.doc: An message to be included in a notification email.

param.name: emails
param.doc: An array of emails for which to notify users about the newly shared file or folder.

param.name: notify
param.doc: If this parameter is set to "1", then a notification email will be sent to users. If set to "0", notifications will not be sent.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method requests new friends to be added to the user's network. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: message
param.doc: An message to be included in a notification email.

param.name: emails
param.doc: An array of emails for which to notify users about the friend request.

param.name: params
param.doc: Allows you to set additional, optional parameters.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to retrieve a list of the user's friends. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: params
param.doc: Allows you to set additional, optional parameters.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method copies a file that publicly shared by another individual and into a user's a designated folder in the user's Box. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: file_id
param.doc: The id of the file you wish to copy.

param.name: public_name
param.doc: The unique public name of the shared file that you wish to copy.

param.name: folder_id
param.doc: The folder_id of the folder to which you will copy the item.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A list of tags to apply to the file when copied into the user's own folder.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method enables or disables the upload email address for a folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: folder_id
param.doc: The id of the folder for which to enable or disable the upload email.

param.name: enable
param.doc: Whether or not to enable the upload email for the folder.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method applies a tag or tags to a designated file or folder. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be tagged. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item you wish to tag. If the target is a folder, this will be the folder_id. If the target is a file, this will be the file_id.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A list of tags that will be applied to the target (file or folder), and which will replace all existing tags on that item.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method returns all the tags in a user's account. Note that, if you want to find the tags associated with a particular file or folder, get_account_tree can be used. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to retrieve the comments on an item. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be selected. This can be set as 'file' or 'folder'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item for which you would like to obtain the comments.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to add a comment to an item. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be selected. Values can be 'file', 'folder', or 'comment'.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the item to which you would like to add the comment.

param.name: message
param.doc: The message of the comment you wish to add.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to delete a comment. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the comment that you would like to delete.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to retrieve the past versions of a file. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: target
param.doc: The type of item to be selected. Currently this method only applies to the 'file' type.

param.name: target_id
param.doc: The id of the file for which you would like to retrieve the past versions.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method is used to set a past version of a file as the current version. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: version_id
param.doc: The id of the item version that you would like to set as current.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method gets a list of items that would normally be obtained through search. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: query
param.doc: The text of which the user wishes to perform a search.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page number, which begins on page 1. This coincides with the per_page parameter.

param.name: per_page
param.doc: The number of search results to display per page.

param.name: sort
param.doc: The method in which the results may be sorted. Values can be 'relevance', 'name', 'date', or 'size'.

param.name: direction
param.doc: Can specify whether to sort content in ascending or descending order. Values can be 'asc' or 'desc'.

param.name: params
param.doc: Additional, optional parameters.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This method returns the content of a user's Updates tab. Authentication token (auth_token) is required.

param.name: begin_timestamp
param.doc: A UNIX timestamp of the earliest point in time to obtain an update (the time of the oldest update you want to display).

param.name: end_timestamp
param.doc: A UNIX timestamp of the latest point in time to obtain an update.

param.name: params
param.doc: Additional, optional parameters.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Downloads a file.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Downloads a past version of a file. The version_id can be obtained by using the get_versions API method.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Uploads a file. Note: Uploading a file to this URL will overwrite the file if a file by the same name already exists, unless the new_copy parameter is specified.

param.name: new_copy
param.doc: If set to "1", the uploaded file will saved as a new copy if it is the same name as an existing file, and the existing file will not be overwritten.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Uploads a file and overwrites the existing file with it.

param.name: file_name
param.doc: An optional new name for the uploaded/overwritten file.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Makes a new copy of the file. The filename of the copy will have "(<copy_number>)" appended to it, unless the new_file_name parameter is specified.

param.name: new_file_name
param.doc: An optional new name for the copied file.
